channel.title: Client (Make so you dont need to login)
channel.description: How do I make it so you dont need a client to log onto the server, I am using googlescape source, Im trying to recode it atm :P

item.title: Client (Make so you dont need to login)
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

ok first thing you do is you go to the client.java in your client files press ctrl +f and search the ip thats in there at the moment in your case either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 either 1 make a no ip change the 127.0.0.1 into your ip then there will be a port 43594 change that into like 80… or somthing… then type ctrl +f and look up server ip: then remove the whole thing same with the port.

i hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Client (Make so you dont need to login)
